brainly_data.question: For work needs, I have to create multiple accounts of facebook and Whatsapp and run at the same time with my personal account. I use Android system. Is there any way to run multiple accounts like this??
brainly_data.subject: Computers and technology

all_answers.question: For work needs, I have to create multiple accounts of facebook and Whatsapp and run at the same time with my personal account. I use Android system. Is there any way to run multiple accounts like this??
all_answers.subject: Computers and technology
all_answers.text: There is a 5 dollar app (I think it goes by the name Parallel or Parallel universe) that lets you have the same app open multiple times at once

top_answer.question: For work needs, I have to create multiple accounts of facebook and Whatsapp and run at the same time with my personal account. I use Android system. Is there any way to run multiple accounts like this??
top_answer.subject: Computers and technology
top_answer.text: There is a 5 dollar app (I think it goes by the name Parallel or Parallel universe) that lets you have the same app open multiple times at once
